column4: who can help me with a torrent files problem, i cant use any client only bittorrent. anyone can help? please...
i'd install azuereus and deluge, and when i open the torrent file with those the client close, it mean the window program close and nothing happends.
if a program ever opens, then closes suddenly, it's a good guess it crashed. By running the program in a terminal, you'll get some helpful information
